text: I am using batch/upsert api for creating & updating contacts but it saysing email is not unique, what i will do

Hello!
Please can anyone let me know if there is an API where we can pass a parameter like contact Email Address / Record Id and check if this contact exists in a particular list (list id can also be passed as a parameter).

Here is the API endpoint using which you can get contacts by its id
<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts/37421055923>
hello there I want to know that what are the scopes needed to subscribe the webhook for the contact event which is contact.creation
this is the error I'm getting even if my access token have the scope -`crm.objects.contacts.read`  as per the docs
